TransactionStateContext.DepositState: Users deposit funds through the Deposit function or the fallback function.
TransactionStateContext.CollectState: Users withdraw funds through the Collect function if conditions are met.

ExternalInteractions.TokenTransfers: The contract transfers Ether from the user to the contract on deposit and from the contract back to the user on withdrawal.
ExternalInteractions.LogFileInteraction: Logs are recorded using the LogFile contract when deposits or withdrawals occur.
